meanings.definition: Grumbliest: superlative form of grumbly, characterized by complaining or grumbling
meanings.sent1: She is the grumbliest person in our group, always finding something to complain about.
meanings.sent2: Today, I woke up feeling grumbliest than usual, but a cup of tea cheered me up.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumbliest cat couldn't resist purring when offered a warm blanket.
meanings.sent4: The grumbliest clouds in the sky seemed to echo the old man's constant complaints.
meanings.sent5: The grumbliest sound in the house was the creaking of the old wooden floorboards.

meanings.definition: Grumbliest: comparative form of grumbly, expressing dissatisfaction or annoyance
meanings.sent1: Out of all the students, she appeared grumbliest about the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent2: His tone grew grumbliest as he recounted the frustrating events of the day.
meanings.sent3: The grumbliest squirrel in the park stole all the nuts and buried them in a secret spot.
meanings.sent4: The grumbliest river flowed slowly, as if voicing its discontent with the surrounding landscape.
meanings.sent5: The grumbliest expression on her face made it clear she was not pleased with the outcome.
